meanings.definition: The act of mending or repairing a hole or tear in fabric.
meanings.sent1: I used colorful patches for patching my torn jeans.
meanings.sent2: My grandma is great at patching up old quilts.
meanings.sent3: The patching of my favorite shirt made it look like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like patching up a broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The art of patching can make old things new again.

meanings.definition: The act of updating or fixing software to correct bugs or vulnerabilities.
meanings.sent1: Our IT team is patching the system to improve security.
meanings.sent2: Patch management is crucial for keeping software secure.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of a robot patching up all my computer problems!
meanings.sent4: The software update was like patching a leak in a boat.
meanings.sent5: Patching software regularly helps prevent cyber attacks.
